attributes.title: Bad!
attributes.review: I downloaded the app, keep in mind on my iPhone 11 Pro Max, I download it open it up. Starts glitching so what do I do? I restart my phone! I turn it on and Iâ€™m on android! This sh*t crazy! All my photo albums look like pixel art, my wallpaper tho, donâ€™t get me started. I was walking my brotherâ€™s dogâ€™s cousinâ€™s sisterâ€™s brotherâ€™s Dad to the mall, then I saw something at first it was a dog so I went to pet it, BUT it turned out to be orange hair it grabbed me yanked me and took my phone what happened next? I look up I was like itâ€™s a plane! Itâ€™s a bird! No itâ€™s nothing, no seriously nothing. I was dying so I was hallucinating anyways tho, donâ€™t get this app. Cause like why? Kanye2020 baby!

attributes.title: STEALS YOUR INFORMATION
attributes.review: This app took a total of 69 minutes to download and I had to turn off my phone 5 times to see any progress. I looked past this hoping to support my daddy,  my superhero, trump. Nothing happened for the rest of that day however in the late hours of the night everything started turning. I got a call that my cat ran away, my grandpa died and my whole immediate family got in a tricycle accident. Though upset I thought there couldnâ€™t possibly be connected to downloading the app. Then I decided to fall asleep and deal with this all in the morning. While asleep I woke up and saw a tiny orange man scatter across my room. I thought I was seeing things but then my cat rose from the foot of my bed. He was now orange and wearing a fedora and tiny boots. I then realized that wasnâ€™t my cat that was puss and boots. I then thought shrek wouldnâ€™t be far off. So I got out of bed yelling â€œ take me now shrek, marry me baby girlâ€ and while running to the door I tripped over this fat man orange man. I yelled â€œyouâ€™re not shrek, shrek is green not orangeâ€ he then said in the stupidest voice â€œhehe Iâ€™m taking youâ€. I then decided to show hospitality hoping to distract him and make a run for it. I handed him a glass of water but the first problem was that it was too big. He wasnâ€™t able to hold the glass because his little hands were too small. I then had to get a shot glass which was the perfect size. I filled it with water and handed it over, but then the next problem appeared, he couldnâ€™t drink the water. While focusing on taking a sip I managed to call the police. The police came and told me this was the president, I walked up and asked him how he got my address and garage code. He then said the app I downloaded takes all of that information and to deepest darkest secrets. He said he ordered a puss in boots impersonator because he knew my deepest darkest secret, my love for shrek. I then shouted you canâ€™t order a impersonator! Identity theft is not a joke, Jim! Millions of families suffer every year!! . He then said the app was connected to all my families deaths however not the cat! Overall donâ€™t download this app I lost everything to it

attributes.title: The bugs in this app are insane
attributes.review: The amount of bugs that have to be in this code are astronomical. It really just doesnâ€™t work at all. Itâ€™s like somebody with only HTML experience decided they could code an entire app
